cluster_relations.rel_desc: The news report is about the escaped criminal.
The tales focus on or are about the supernatural and the unknown.
cluster_relations.subject_entity_name: tales of the supernatural and the unknown

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The document segment on ethical dilemmas in AI development also describes the rapid advancement and impacts of Artificial Intelligence.

qualifiers.OperationalConstraint: across various industries and aspects of daily life
qualifiers.OtherQualifier: NarrativeRole: sets context for subsequent ethical discussion

args.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that a narrative, document, or discourse segment is about or concerns a particular topic, entity, or concept.
args.justification: All three relations connect a narrative or document-like subject (news report, tales, document segment) to the topic they describe or focus on, with rel_hint_type and CausalHint explicitly indicating aboutness. A unified predicate 'is_about' captures this document-to-topic relation without qualifiers.
args.remark: Use for content-topic or narrative-topic links where the subject is informational content and the object is its main topic.

args.justification: These predicates all belong to the same family of relations that link an informational artifact (report, tale, document section) to what it is about or discusses, i.e., aboutness/subject-matter relations.
Aboutness links are high-level semantic associations between content and topic rather than compositional, causal, or spatial relations, so they best fit a broad ASSOCIATION group.

Aboutness links are high-level semantic associations between content and topic rather than compositional, causal, or spatial relations, so they best fit a broad ASSOCIATION group.
